page.title: 18BUS SERVICES TO BRAMPTON
page.content: Due to the recent change in government policy,the scheduled bus services in this area are now almost non-existant. Between May & September 1985,there was only 1 bus each week.This ran on Penrith Market Day (Tuesdays) between Penrith & Appleby & passes through the village of Brampton. Since September the service also runs on Fridays. Previously the service was more frequent,being 2 buses in each direction,Monday to Friday,with extra buses on Tuesdays,Thursdays & Saturdays.The service also used to continue South to Kirkby Stephen. Dufton is no longer served by any scheduled service whereas before there were 2 buses a week in each direction (Thursdays & Saturdays).The only other buses are the school & works buses.The school buses take children fom Dufton & Brampton to Long Marton & Appleby.
